content: the angela makes vanilla amv shorties are a free vanilla shortie sock pattern it is accompanied by a video tutorial 1 https //youtu be/e4myhlyijms with the aim of showing you how i knit socks i really struggled when i started knitting socks and watched many video tutorials i am hoping this will help at least one of you who are starting out or restarting your sock knitting journey this can also be extended to a full sock if this is what you prefer to wear just remember you will need more than the recommended sock yarn instructions are included for three different sizes * small 7 foot circumference * medium 8 foot circumference * large 9 foot circumference these socks were a medium uk5 eu38 so if you are knitting socks for a larger foot or the large size you will need a little extra yarn i have been generous with the amount of yarn presented below yarn used in sample mc yarn is rico alpaca art sock yarn 400m/100g 55% wool 25% polyamide 25% alpaca all other yarn is sock/4ply yarn 425m / 100g 75% merino 25% nylon for both socks 6g for the cuff 25g of main 8g for heel and 8g for toe 1 https //youtu be/e4myhlyijms
